cast.name: 丹尼尔·奥特伊 Daniel Auteuil
瓦莱丽·勒梅西埃 Valérie Lemercier
蒂埃里·莱尔米特 Thierry Lhermitte
卢德维克·伯特希尔克 Ludovic Berthillot
阿兰·德·卡图兰 Alain de Catuelan
伊波利特·吉拉尔多 Hippolyte Girardot
阿尔蒂斯·德·彭居埃恩 Artus de Penguern

director.name: 劳伦特·博尼克 Laurent Bouhnik

introduction: 年过五旬并失业三年的杰拉尔已陷入绝望，却突然受聘去印度尼西亚。他决定给自己的新老板一个好印象，便邀请他来吃晚餐。这真是一个巨大的错误！惊慌失措的妻子柯蕾叫来了他们的邻居亚历山大。亚历山大决定为这对夫妇进行最后24小时的改变。他们的公寓，内部设计，生活方式，品味，时尚感，基本知识，没有一样可以忽略！经过一系列的安排，身心疲惫的杰拉尔和柯蕾打开家门，迎来了他们的客人……Fifty years old, and unemployed for three years, Gerard is getting desperate when out of the blue he is offered a job in Indonesia. Determined to make a good impression on his new boss, Gerard invites him to dinner. BIG mistake! Panic-stricken, Colette, Gerard's wife, calls Alexandre, their neighbour. Alexandre resolves to give the couple the ultimate 24-hour makeover. Their apartment, interior design, lifestyle, taste, fashion sense, general knowledge... nothing is overlooked! After many arrangements, with frazzled nerves, Gerard and Colette open the door to welcome... their dinner guest.
